1611872425_1F57R2GNQqq1McDDceeEekBpYwdWi.body: If you can spare the bandwidth, keep Zeronet running in the background so the zites you visit are seeded to other users.

How to mute a user,  hover the mouse over a username or comment and you will see three dots near username or comment, click these dots and click 'mute user', click on the confirmation in the top right corner.
This blacklists the user and removes any content they post from your computer.
